entry.title: Alternative name for CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY (BIP112)
entry.summary: In a bitcoin-dev email thread, Eric Lombrozo proposed that the full opcode name for CHECKRELATIVELOCKTIMEVERIFY should be abbreviated. He suggested using both CLTV and CRLTV for abbreviation, however, these abbreviations are hard to distinguish from each other. Peter Todd suggested using the abbreviation AGEVERIFY instead, which is short and sweet.
